alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Mississippi, central Tipton, southwestern Lauderdale and northeastern Shelby Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Marie to 6 miles south of Fulton to 7 miles southeast of Munford. Movement was north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Millington, Covington, Osceola, Manila, Luxora, Wilson, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Lakeland, Munford, Brighton, Dell, Burdette, Bassett, Marie, Fulton, Ashport, Ft Pillow and Dixonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
